## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G50610](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G50610)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CEP9</u>
- **Gene Name:** C-Terminally Encoded Peptide 9
- **Description:**   DNA-directed RNA polymerase II subunit RPB1-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2098695
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
